ygData.msgSnippet: ... items should be always spawned on npcs  not for the reason that i want ... but for the fact that it would stop some abuse of zone camping items Yeah,
ygData.messageBody:

items should be always spawned on npcs not for the reason that i want
>items
but for the fact that it would stop some abuse of zone camping items

Yeah, having the item spawn every time may help. Kinda like how you would
play a single-player game where you kill the big baddie and win a prize a la
Zelda heh. It still gives you the sense of acheivement and it will satisfy
those who need the items....you get it and you move on! (one would
hope....) :)

Hey! by the way, Cazic is a great spot for those in their 20's. I wouldn't
hang around without a group though...but if you're in a solid group you
can't beat the xp there. I average 2 to 3 bubs of xp a night not to mention
pulling in near 100pp everytime I get back to town. Heheh...last night I
was so encumbered poor Lim had to nearly crawl into town. (one wonders
where a skinny wizard carries all the backpacks? heh)

--Lim'Dul
